sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: CUPS provides accept, cupsaddsmb, cupsd, cupstestppd, lpadmin, lpc, lpinfo, lpmove, reject, cancel, cups-config, disable, enable, lp, lpoptions, lppasswd, lpq, lpr, lprm, lpstat, libcups, libcupsimage and various scripts and filters.

sect3.title: lpc
sect3.para: lpc provides limited control over printer and class queues provided by CUPS .

sect3.title: cupsd
sect3.para: cupsd is the scheduler for the Common UNIX Printing System.

sect3.title: accept
sect3.para: accept instructs the printing system to accept print jobs to the specified destinations.

sect3.title: reject
sect3.para: reject reject instructs the printing system to reject print jobs to the specified destinations.

sect3.title: cupsaddsmb
sect3.para: cupsaddsmb exports printers to the SAMBA software for use with Windows clients.

sect3.title: lpadmin
sect3.para: lpadmin configures printer and class queues provided by CUPS.

sect3.title: lpinfo
sect3.para: lpinfo lists the available devices or drivers known to the CUPS server.

sect3.title: lpmove
sect3.para: lpmove moves the specified job to a new destination.

sect3.title: cupstestppd
sect3.para: cupstestppd tests the conformance of PPD files.

sect3.title: lpq
sect3.para: lpq shows the current print queue status on the named printer.

sect3.title: lpr
sect3.para: lpr submits files for printing.

sect3.title: lprm
sect3.para: lprm cancels print jobs that have been queued for printing.

sect3.title: cancel
sect3.para: cancel cancels existing print jobs.

sect3.title: disable
sect3.para: disable stops the named printers or classes.

sect3.title: enable
sect3.para: enable starts the named printers or classes.

sect3.title: lp
sect3.para: lp submits files for printing or alters a pending job.

sect3.title: lpoptions
sect3.para: lpoptions displays or sets printer options and defaults.

sect3.title: lpstat
sect3.para: lpstat displays status information about the current classes, jobs, and printers.

sect3.title: lppasswd
sect3.para: lppasswd adds, changes or deletes passwords in the CUPS digest password file passwd.md5.

sect3.title: cups-config
sect3.para: cups-config is the CUPS program configuration utility.
